title: Store Page IS VERY slow to load
body: So I try to get onto the store page and it takes anywhere from 1 to 5 minutes to load every time it comes up. League I can play fine everything else works great but for like the last 2 or 3 months it just takes FOREVER to load the store page.

replies.body: well its probly the fact I have a 3mb connection.

When you load the store, your network needs to establish a connection in order to download assets but can lag out if not strong enough.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is causing your network to suffer when attempting to connect to the store.  Let me know if you have any questions!
